name: Chronically Late
description:
You play as a character who has a disability called Dysautonomia, which can make it hard to do day to day tasks. 

You only have a certain amount of energy to work with and it may surprise you the amount of things that take a large portion of your energy for the day!

If you run out of energy you faint and its game over! So try your best to get everything done so that you're able to go on your date with your girlfriend!

Made in under 4 day for the Crash Course Game Jam #6 2020

Controls: 

Wasd to move

z to interact

Any feedback is loved and appreciated!

Made with RPG Maker mv

(Mac and Linux Versions are NOT playtested)
